hooks.description: Validate HR document formatting before committing. Ensures job descriptions, review templates, and onboarding plans follow the required structure and include all mandatory sections.

actions.name: job-description-structure-check
actions.description: Verify job descriptions contain all required sections: role summary, responsibilities, required qualifications, preferred qualifications, compensation range, and EEO statement
actions.on_failure_message: Job description is missing required sections. Run /proagent-hr-review review job descriptions to identify and fix gaps.

actions.name: inclusive-language-check
actions.description: Scan HR documents for biased or exclusionary language patterns
actions.on_failure_message: Document contains potentially biased language. Review flagged terms and replace with inclusive alternatives.

actions.name: pii-protection-check
actions.description: Warn if HR documents containing PII (social security numbers, salary figures, personal addresses) are being committed to version control
actions.on_failure_message: Potential PII detected in HR document. Remove sensitive personal data before committing. Use secure HR systems for storing employee PII.

hooks.description: Validate onboarding plans are complete before sharing with new hires. Ensures all phases are covered and milestones have owners and deadlines.

actions.name: onboarding-plan-completeness
actions.description: Verify onboarding plans include day-one checklist, 30/60/90-day milestones, buddy assignment, and review schedule
actions.on_failure_message: Onboarding plan is missing required phases. Run /proagent-hr-review onboarding plans to identify gaps.

hooks.description: Validate performance review templates before distribution. Ensures review documents align with company competency frameworks and include balanced feedback sections.

actions.name: review-template-structure
actions.description: Verify performance review documents contain self-assessment, peer feedback, and manager evaluation sections with aligned competency criteria
actions.on_failure_message: Performance review template is missing required sections. Run /proagent-hr-run performance-review to generate a complete template.
